title: Asian Stocks Rise to Extend Record Global Rally: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities edged up at the open Tuesday, extending a record-breaking run for global equities as investors looked past geopolitical concerns.
content: Asian equities edged up at the open Tuesday, extending a record-breaking run for global equities as investors looked past geopolitical concerns.
